Localization.Name: DMC
Localization.Description: Still renowned for their denim, DMC (Denim Manufacture Corporation) has become so much more. From durable outerwear to rugged fashion, DMC knows that feeling good is just as important as looking good.

English.Name: DMC
English.Description: Still renowned for their denim, DMC (Denim Manufacture Corporation) has become so much more. From durable outerwear to rugged fashion, DMC knows that feeling good is just as important as looking good.

Localization.Name: Foundation Pants (Modified)
Localization.Description: Carrying Capacity: 1K µSCU\n\nThis version of DMC's Foundation pants has been modified from its original form. DMC's Foundation line is just that; the foundation for your work wear. Featuring a simple, elegant cut with easy-access pockets, the Foundation is both professional and functional.
